explains: v. 提供，给予；为（可能事件）做充分准备；抚养，赡养（provide 的现在分词）
wordGroup: provide for 供养，供给；规定；为…作准备
provide against 规定禁止；预防

sentences.en: More and more restaurants are providing nonsmoking areas.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的餐馆正在提供无烟区。

sentences.en: The city is providing free transportation to the stadium from downtown.
sentences.cn: 本市现在提供从市中心到体育场的免费交通。

sentences.en: Before providing the cash, they will have to decide whether you are a good or bad risk.
sentences.cn: 提供资金之前，他们得确定你是风险小还是大的信贷对象。
